summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of 35th Avenue West from Thurman Street to approximately 250 feet north thereof, and certain other streets, avenues and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6203, authorizing and increasing the amount to be paid from the Water Fund and Municipal Sewerage 1959 Construction Fund in aid thereof and amending Section 2 of Ordinance No. 88261.
